system.note: Two Handed Weapon. Can corrupt Imperial Technology using this by making a -30 Tech-Use Test, if successful, interfaced technology is unusable by anyone that is not the user or a fellow Heretek. Has an inbuilt Combi-Tool.

description.value:
Special: Power Field, Unbalanced

Note: Two Handed Weapon. Can corrupt Imperial Technology using this by making a -30 Tech-Use Test, if successful, interfaced technology is unusable by anyone that is not the user or a fellow Heretek. Has an inbuilt Combi-Tool.
